title: Adi parAshakti
sahitya:
Adi parAshakti aNaiyum maNi magavE AdarittaruLum Anai mukha deivamE


anupallavi

  ponnaDi paNiyum aDiyOrkkellAm punnagaiyOD-aruL tandiDum piraiyE perumidamOD-


caraNam    tanjam enrunai nADuvOrkkellAm konjamEnum unnai ninaittOrkkumE
vanjanai inri aruL vAri vazhangiDuvAi shen shaDaiyOn maganE unak-anjali anjali
